00033 class Topology;
00034 class Molecule;

00038 
00039 class PolarSite
00040 {
00041 
00042     friend class EMultipole;
00043     friend class EMultipole_StdAl;
00044     friend class EOutersphere;
00045     friend class Interactor;
00046     friend class Interactor3;
00047     friend class InteractorMod;
00048 
00049 public:
00050 
00051     PolarSite(int id, string name)
00052             : _id(id), _name(name), _locX(vec(1,0,0)),
00053               _locY(vec(0,1,0)),    _locZ(vec(0,0,1))
00054             { _Qs.resize(3); _Ps.resize(3); };
00055 
00056     PolarSite() 
00057             : _id(-1),  _locX(vec(1,0,0)),
00058               _locY(vec(0,1,0)), _locZ(vec(0,0,1))
00059             { _Qs.resize(3); _Ps.resize(3); };
00060 
00061    ~PolarSite() {};
00062 
00063     int             &getId() { return _id; }
00064     string          &getName() { return _name; }
00065     vec             &getPos() { return _pos; }
00066     int             &getRank() { return _rank; }
00067     Topology        *getTopology() { return _top; }
00068     Segment         *getSegment() { return _seg; }
00069     Fragment        *getFragment() { return _frag; }
00070 
00071     void            setPos(vec &pos) { _pos = pos; }
00072     void            setRank(int rank) { _rank = rank; } // rank; } // OVERRIDE
00073     void            setTopology(Topology *top) { _top = top; }
00074     void            setSegment(Segment *seg) { _seg = seg; }
00075     void            setFragment(Fragment *frag) { _frag = frag; }
00076 
00077     vector<double> &getQs(int state) { return _Qs[state+1]; }
00078     void            setQs(vector<double> Qs, int state) { _Qs[state+1] = Qs; }
00079     void            setPs(double polar, int state) { _Ps[state+1] = polar; }
00080     double         &getPs(int state) { return _Ps[state+1]; }
00081     double         &getP1() { return P1; }
00082     void            Charge(int state);
00083     void            ChargeDelta(int state1, int state2);
00084 
00085     void            Induce(double wSOR = 0.25);
00086     void            InduceDirect();
00087     void            ResetFieldU() { FUx = FUy = FUz = 0.0; }
00088     void            ResetFieldP() { FPx = FPy = FPz = 0.0; }
00089     void            ResetU1Hist() { U1_Hist.clear(); }
00090     void            Depolarize();
00091     double          HistdU();
00092 
00093 
00094     void            ImportFrom(PolarSite *templ, string tag = "basic");
00095     void            Translate(const vec &shift);
00096     void            Rotate(const matrix &rot, const vec &refPos);
00097 
00098     void            PrintInfo(std::ostream &out);
00099     void            PrintInfoInduce(std::ostream &out);
00100     void            PrintInfoVisual(FILE *out);
00101 
00102 
00103 
00104 
00105 private:
00106 
00107     int     _id;
00108     string  _name;
00109     vec     _pos;
00110     vec     _locX;
00111     vec     _locY;
00112     vec     _locZ;
00113 
00114     Topology *_top;
00115     Segment  *_seg;
00116     Fragment *_frag;
00117     
00118     vector < vector<double> > _Qs;
00119     int     _rank;
00120                            
00121     vector < double > _Ps;
00122     double P1;                              // Dipole polarizability
00123 
00124     double Q00;
00125     double Q1x, Q1y, Q1z;    
00126     double Q20, Q21c, Q21s, Q22c, Q22s;
00127 
00128     double U1x, U1y, U1z;                   // Induced dipole
00129     double FPx, FPy, FPz;                   // Electric field (due to permanent)
00130     double FUx, FUy, FUz;                   // Electric field (due to induced)
00131     vector< vec > U1_Hist;                  // Ind. u history
